For a timely response please send email to admin@cs.siu.edu Dr. Bidyut Gupta Professor Ph.D., University of Calcutta, 1986 Senior Member, IEEE Contact Info Phone: (618)453-7194 Fax: (618)453-6044 Email: bidyut@cs.siu.edu Mail Address : Department of Computer Science Southern Illinois University Carbondale Carbondale, IL 62901 Mailcode 4511 Office: Faner 3044 Current Research Interests: Distributed systems, cluster computing, mobile computing, and computer networks Cluster computing has recently enjoyed an increase in popularity as a distributed computing architecture for its applications including supercomputing, large scale code coupling etc. The design of fault-tolerant algorithms for distributed cluster computing environment is a new challenging area. Dr. Gupta's research activity mainly concentrates on designing such algorithms. Besides, the growing importance of cellular, mobile ad-hoc, and sensor networks for their many applications, designing energy efficient communication protocols for such networks is a demanding area of research in which he is also currently involved.
